TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tamalon, title = Tamalon, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tamalon} }

S.FORM: Tamalon Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Tamalon a niyaro', 90 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 277 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 13% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 37 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 87% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 240 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal11%, Amis1%, Rukai1%.

Tamalon Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Tamalon a niyaro', 90 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 277 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 13% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 37 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 87% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 240 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal11%, Amis1%, Rokai1%.
